send_command.name: Send command
send_command.description: Send a command to the API.

command_name.name: Command name
command_name.description: Name of the command. Can be retrieved from "Get commands" service call.

command_data_text.name: Command data (Text)
command_data_text.description: Optional data for the command. Can be retrieved from "Get commands" service call. NOTE: the text form does not seem to be used and is included for debugging purposes only.

command_data_number.name: Command data (Number)
command_data_number.description: Optional data for the command if the command expects a number. Can be retrieved from "Get commands" service call.

command_data_boolean.name: Command data (Boolean)
command_data_boolean.description: Optional data for the command if the command expects a boolean. Can be retrieved from "Get commands" service call.

get_commands.name: Get commands
get_commands.description: Get list of commands supported by the device
